thread.section_title: Wiggle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle | wiggle.com.au
thread.title: Mal Mac

author: Mal Mac
title: Mal Mac
text: Sure you can shop around and maybe find the odd better deal on a high tag item than Wiggle, but overall I have found them to be better on average. This is especially true when you don't have big bucks to spend but want to save money. For example tubes, energy tabs/gels, bidons....you know, the smaller things you use a lot. So you save up and order what you need to get to the free delivery threshold and presto! You've saved $$$ and got what you need. I know bricks and mortar stores need to make their slice but I personally just can't justify the cost of certain "luxury" items from them let alone the essentials! So for me Wiggle has been fantastic, allowing me to almost keep up with the Jones'.
